    com.ibm.iotf.client.api  

    • Uses of Device in com.ibm.iotf.client.api

      Methods in com.ibm.iotf.client.api that return Device 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Device DeviceFactory.getDevice(java.lang.String deviceType, java.lang.String deviceId)
      This method retrieves a device in the org whose authkey and token were passed previously
      Device[] DeviceFactory.getDevices()
      This method returns an array of all the devices belonging to the organization

      This method registers a device
